scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.copy:client: if exist electron\app\client rmdir /S /Q electron\app\client && mkdir electron\app\client && mkdir electron\app\client\dist && xcopy client\dist\* electron\app\client\dist /E /I /Y
scripts.dist: npm run build:client && npm run copy:client && npm run build:electron
scripts.dist:publish: npm run build:client && npm run copy:client && cd electron && npm run publish
scripts.check:renderer: powershell -Command "cd electron/app/client/dist; if (Test-Path 'index.html') { Write-Host '✔ index.html FOUND'; Get-Item 'index.html' | Select-Object Name, Length } else { Write-Host '❌ index.html NOT FOUND' }"
